none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 15, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
It's just good ass hardcore punk music. ENEMY are raw as fukk, with blasted guitars and a hollow sounding bass. The mix kinda varies from track to track in the way that made countless '80s records infinitely more interesting, and they drop guitar leads when they need to (not because they feel like they should). The drums are relentless, like some weirdo rock/rock solid raw punk metronome because they sound more like some fuck you garage punk band than this serious fukkn beast of a demo....ENEMY is really good, y'all - that's what I'm trying to say. Like, REALLY good.  ENEMY
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qC8pKtoddAA/W8Rb9HosBcI/AAAAAAAAUBc/EwMjP9q_jt0ObO3SdAh5KGSI6daHctNhACLcBGAs/s1600/Enemy%2Boutside%2Bcopy.jpg

seo.title: Enemy - Enemy demo - Terminal Escape
